name: DOCS_RCVD_PCCNOTE
description: This table stores discrete information for patient care coordination notes received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PCCNOTE_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference identifier associated with the care coordination note.

columns.name: PCCNOTE_SIGNED_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant when the patient care coordination note was signed.

columns.name: PCCNOTE_AUTHOR
columns.description: This item stores the author's name of the patient care coordination note.

columns.name: PCCNOTE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the identifier of the Notes (HNO) record that stores the patient care coordination note.

columns.name: PCCNOTE_SRC_CSN
columns.description: This item stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the Document Received record that owns the instance of this patient care coordination note.

columns.name: PCC_LST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last update instant of a Patient Care Coordination note in UTC.
